tasks.name: Do Dishes
tasks.description: Rinse dishes from the sink, place into then run dishwasher.

tasks.name: Apply To Jobs
tasks.description: Search job boards for jobs that closely align with interests and experience. Draft cover letter and resume then apply.

tasks.name: Practice Algos
tasks.description: Join the daily morning algo-club zoom study sessions for algo practice.

tasks.name: Daily Exercise
tasks.description: Remember to get out of the house to get some exercise like go for walks, yoga or ride bikes.
